alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Laurens; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 9:25AM EST until January 17 at 8:13PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River at Dublin affecting Laurens, Johnson, Washington and Wilkinson Counties. For the Oconee River Basin...including Penfield, Milledgeville, Oconee, Oconee, McIntyre, Irwinton, Oconee, Dublin, Mount Vernon... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Oconee River at Dublin. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 23.5 feet, Minor flooding spreads further into the woodland areas. The water level begins to flood Rex Miller Road... downstream left bank of the Highway 80 bridge. Also Old River Lane...upstream and left bank from the bridge begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EST Saturday the stage was 19.9 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 23.5 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 23.4 feet on 03/19/1895. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued this evening at 930 PM EST.
